nodes.text: Cresh Krill Yirt was a series of holovids that featured Xexto performing various kinds of daring stunts, which often ended in severe injuries. The individuals starring in those holovids had a cult-like following in the Xexto society, whose members were accustomed to a lifestyle of risk-taking.

Cresh, Krill, and Yirt are the Aurebesh equivalent of the Roman letters C, K, and Y. The Cresh Krill Yirt holovids feature individuals performing dangerous stunts, like the real-life CKY video series.
